post.description: Retrieve details of a disease including its schedules, solutions, and pest based on the provided disease name.

parameters.name: disease
parameters.description: Name of the disease to retrieve details for

200.description: Disease details including schedules, solutions, and pest

schedule.description: List of schedules related to the disease

solutions.description: List of solutions related to the disease

description.example: Gunakan pupuk organik untuk meningkatkan kesuburan tanah.

pest.description: List of pests related to the disease

post.summary: Send reset password OTP to email

post.description: Logout the authenticated user and invalidate the token.

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to update their profile details.

get.description: Retrieve user details based on their ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

get.description: Returns a list of all histories.

post.description: Creates a new history record and returns it.

get.description: Returns a list of histories for a specific user.

404.description: No histories found for this user

get.description: Retrieve a list of all informatifs

post.description: Create a new informatifs with an image

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific informatifs by its ID

put.description: Update the informatifs by its ID

delete.description: Delete a specific informatifs by its ID

post.summary: Create a new pest or disease
post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

get.summary: Get a pest or disease by ID

created_at.description: Timestamp when the history was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the history was last updated

bearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer <your-token>
